Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Priority valve malfunction. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 05/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
